title: Bug 4121 - JarExporter causes out of sync
description: Bug 4121 - JarExporter causes out of sync
OB: When a directory (project) is exported and the exported jar is placed in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when the exported jar file is overwritten for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid the out of sync message.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Export a directory (project) as a jar file.
2. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project).
3. Overwrite the exported jar file.
4. Repeat step 3.
